text: So you've found my 'About Me' section... What do you really want to know?

options.text: What have I been up to?
What did I used to do?
What was I like in high school?

text: Most recently, I've been freelancing in the New York area, creating SVG animations and React websites for large pharmaceutical companies. My background is originally in creative technology, as I majored in Post Production/New Media at Emerson College in 2016. Todd yammers on and on about his wretched children. 'Christopher is going to state for track','Tourance got into Harvard'... GIVE ME A BREAK!!! How are we going to get out of this conversation?

options.text: 'Tell him about the stain on his shirt'
'Simply just walk away to the coffee machine'
